title: Small indie devs, by the way.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/244edcd450a9b3d3f2c7177ce44561a3.png

I own the champ and don't get my chest because I don't own the champ? Nice.

https://i.gyazo.com/bad0bd64508043cf71b1c8570b60cf7f.png

Can't see who I need to kill

https://i.gyazo.com/7498759b3a7fa5c3dd9f3795e6633594.png

And happens with every rune page.

Nice.

replies.body: there's also an ear rape bug right now, and I'm not sure how to trigger it, but for now, I'd suggest anyone playing against a volibear, to turn off ingame sound. Because the sound clip keeps spamming and it is very annoying.
From what i heard they also stuffed up all of teemos Text boxes as well.
